name: ext-cli
description: Command-line argument parsing, help, and shell completion.
docs:
Specrows-based CLI parsing.

- Compile a specrows JSON command spec with ext.cli.specrows.compile.
- Parse argv bytes with ext.cli.parse_specrows(spec_json_bytes, argv_v1_bytes).
- On error, use ext.cli.err_msg / ext.cli.err_usage.
- On success, use ext.cli.matches_cmd and ext.cli.matches_get.
